Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes the assistant district attorney of the county of Chautauqua to reside outside of such county
Summary: Authorizes the assistant district attorney of the county of Chautauqua to reside outside of such county.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to authorizing the assistant district attorney of the county of Chautauqua to reside outside of such county
